addons.name: R-kiosk
addons.description: Real Kiosk is a Firefox extension that defaults to full screen, disables all menus, toolbars, key commands and right button menus. Alt+Home still takes you home. ...
addons.eula:
R-Kiosk extension is in public domain. It may be freely reproduced, distributed, transmitted, used, modified, built upon, or otherwise used by anyone for commercial or non-commercial purposes.

R-Kiosk extension is supplied as is. You use this extension at your own risk.

addons.name: Noise
addons.description: Make sound responses while events happen.
addons.fullDescription:
Supports events which can be captured by:

    nsIObserverService.addObserver
    gBrowser.addEventListener
    window.addEventListener


You can specify sound files by:

    String "beep" to play a platform-dependent beep.
    Local wav file, like: "C:\WINDOWS\Media\ding.wav"
    chrome wav file, like: "chrome://global/content/notfound.wav"


Noise also lets events below to send notification. So we can capture them by observe these topics:

    Findbar wrapped (noise-TypeAheadFind.FIND_WRAPPED)
    Toggle sidebar (noise-toggleSidebar)
    Alert notificationbox (noise-alert-loaded)
    Start navigation (noise-WebProgress-start) learned much from PopupSound extension
    Stop navigation (noise-WebProgress-stop)
    Change location (noise-WebProgress-locationChange)
    Download events (noise-dl.add/remove/stop/error) for Firefox 26 and above.


NOTE for users need Firefox 26 download events:
Please pick new settings from Event Guide window, it's on top corner of Preference window. Check the download events and they are added to your preference.
addons.developerComments:
This package doesn't include any sound files, it only make boring "beep"s by default.
You can try finding wav files in your system's built-in media folder, or searching them online.
